survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with In-Flight Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with various in-flight services provided by airlines, including food, entertainment, and crew service.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall in-flight service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall in-flight service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following in-flight services did you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all services used.

script.question_text: Which of the following in-flight services did you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food and beverage service?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Food and beverage' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Did not use' option for respondents who did not use the service.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the food and beverage service?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Food and beverage' in Q2

questions.question_text: How would you rate the variety of in-flight entertainment options?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'In-flight entertainment' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Did not use' option for respondents who did not use the service.

script.question_text: How would you rate the variety of in-flight entertainment options?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'In-flight entertainment' in Q2

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the Wi-Fi speed and reliability?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Did not use' option for respondents who did not use the service.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the Wi-Fi speed and reliability?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your seating?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your seating?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the friendliness and professionalism of the cabin crew?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How would you rate the friendliness and professionalism of the cabin crew?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any issues during your flight? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any specific issues encountered.

script.question_text: Did you experience any issues during your flight? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this airline to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this airline to others?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving in-flight services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any additional feedback.
